pkgmetadata.longdescription: =============codenerix-lib=============Codenerix LIB is a base module of libraries used by `CODENERIX <http://www.codenerix.com/>`_ you can visit the project at Github `https://github.com/codenerix/django-codenerix`.. image:: https://github.com/codenerix/django-codenerix/raw/master/codenerix/static/codenerix/img/codenerix.png :target: https://www.codenerix.com :alt: Try our demo with Codenerix Cloud**********Quickstart**********1. Install this package:: For python 2: sudo pip2 install codenerix-lib For python 3: sudo pip3 install codenerix-lib2. Since Codenerix LIB is a library, you only need to import its parts into your project and use them.*************Documentation*************Coming soon... do you help us?You can get in touch with us `here <https://codenerix.com/contact/>`_.
